meaningMnemonic: The <radical>life</radical> radical is without the slide (as it sometimes is), but when you combine that with the <radical>winter</radical> radical, you have life during winter. What gives you life during the winter? It's the <kanji>wheat</kanji> you store away.
readingMnemonic: You found your <kanji>wheat</kanji>. Thank God. You'll survive. You have to take the wheat back to your house, though. On your way, you get <reading>mug</reading>ged (むぎ).
